short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Block malicious websites from being accessed in the browser.
short.de: Blockiert den Zugriff auf bösartige Webseiten im Browser.
short.es: Bloquear el accesso a sitios web maliciosos desde el navegador.
short.fr: Bloquer l'accès des mauvais sites par le browser.
short.he: חוסם גישה לאתרים המכילים נוזקות מהדפדפן
short.hi: दुर्भावनापूर्ण वेबसाइटों को ब्राउज़र में रोकें।
short.no: Hindre at ondsinnede nettsteder blir aksessert med nettleseren.
short.pt_BR: Bloqueio de acesso a sites maliciosos no navegador.
short.ru: Блокирование вредоносных веб сайтов для вашего браузера.
short.tr: Kötü amaçlı web sitelerine erişilmesini engelleyin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blockade brings antivirus-like capabilities to users who run the Chrome browser. Built as an extension, Blockade blocks malicious resources from being viewed or loaded inside of the browser. Blockade focuses on those who are often targeted via phishing attacks and may not have a substantial capability at their disposal. 

Using threat intelligence mined from multiple sources (and analysts), Blockade attempts to detect attacks that may exist in the browser by monitoring web traffic requests. The primary goal for the project is to detect and prevent as many attacks as possible for those who would otherwise go left unnoticed.
